reviews.content:
Work fine 
But make infinity loop after reboot and rejailbreak

Videoswipes doesnâ€™t work on the newer versions of YouTube. In order to get it to work you need to downgrade YouTube to 15.06.3 using AppStore++ and also need YouTube Reborn so you can disable related videos in overlay in settings.

semi-functional on iphone xs Max ios13.3.  (using cercube 5) swipe-ups working, swipe-downs not working. swipe-downs bring up youtube's menus instead of lowering brightness or Volume. left-right swipes working perfect to skip seconds within video.
It sometimes works but I had to disable it because I think it was breaking video rotation.
